ygData.subject: RE: Guise of the Deceiver
ygData.msgSnippet: You know, I do not see why they cannot make an item that has to be aquipped for the effect to work. Haste sashes work.. Cold/heat stones work. need I go on?;)
ygData.messageBody:
You know, I do not see why they cannot make an item that has to be aquipped
for the effect to work.
Haste sashes work.. Cold/heat stones work. need I go on?;)


-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 7:57 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Guise of the Deceiver


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

But their original problem was they said they couldn't make an item only
usable when equipped I thought. Changing the existing Guise would make as
big a stir as the box of Abu whatever crapola.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 5:54 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Guise of the Deceiver


From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 8 Dec 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> They actually fixed the no equip = no usage problem? That might be the
> single biggest Enhancement Verant has made to date. Is it still No Drop I
> wonder?

Well, they didn't fix it. They made a new item. The old
guises still work without being equipped, much to the chagrin
of the non-bard/rogue non-powerlevelers.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
